assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: R Systems International Limited provides information technology and business process outsourcing (BPO) services worldwide. The company offers AWS powered, campaign to closure, customer experience analytics, and TOP testing suite solutions. It also provides technology solutions, such as cloud enablement, digital platforms and solutions, Internet of Things, product engineering, and QA testing; automation and AI data and analytics services, including advanced analytics, AI machine learning, business analytics, business automation, data monetization and modernization, and modern data management; and design services, including re-engineering, UX engineering, mobile user experience, and visual design services. The company serves finance and insurance, healthcare and life science, telecom, technology, and retail and e-commerce sectors. R Systems International Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Noida, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Mandeep Singh Sodhi
companyOfficers.title: Chief Operating Officer of R Systems USA Operations
